entry.title: Acid Reign - You Are Your Enemy - 가사

link.title: Acid Reign - You Are Your Enemy - 가사

entry.content:
Life is irreversible you only get one shot
Leaving behind you a trail of anxiety
You want to do right, you want to understand
But everything you destroy is what you need
Anger and hatred rising
Trying to find normality you bury all the pain
Each day's dawn brings confusion
Yearning for calm you slip into turmoil

LIFE IS HELL

All you need is answers to questions that you deny

HELL IS LIFE

The things you spit on are the things you need the most

Your mind is tormenting your stamina and nerves
Eating away at the remains of sanity
Sometimes you curse the day you caught breath
And wonder how much longer you can last
Memories lock you in the cells of despair
Every bone in your body is aching
When violence is the only way of waking to reality
You see that you are your own enemy

HELL IF LIFE

Your anger is a madman about to be united

LIFE IS HELL

The person you despise is living behind your eyes

entry.title: Acid Reign - Thoughtful Sleep - 가사
entry.content:
April 6 Thursday

Mother
Do you think of me as your son
Or am I just a complication
I need you now, I need you now
A woman of the eighties
You never have time for anyone
I know your shadow, not your face
It breaks the light in my lonely room
As I lie awake in thoughtful sleep
I pray the Lord my soul to keep

Father
Remember me I am your son
Or am I just a distraction
I need you now, I need you now
You live in a material world
People aren't people, they're what they own
With your keyboard fingers and green screen brain
Car phones, hotels, suitcases and planes
Please squeeze me in, I do exist
When time is money what price is love

April 9 Sunday

Even when I was young you didn't notice me
I was raised on helpers, TV and pity
When I cried for help you threw me money
All I wanted was a pound of your time
I feel
Pity for you and your mentality
Hate for you and what you've done to me
Resentment for all your selfishness
Content, content only within my emptiness

Here we see Richard's true mixture of emotions
Bitterness, rejection, contempt even hate
All of which began to plague him more and more in the following days

April 14 Friday

I would try to explain
But you would never listen
I would try to break through
That's the time you would shut me out
I'd just bottle up all my emotions
These feelings bite like a knot inside
This pain I carry in solitude
Chained to me in loneliness
Depression has me, he is my king
He shows the path that I must take
A perversion of justive of the saddest kind
To enter my dreams and I shall not wake

April 15 Saturday

As I sit by fading light
And write to you this final note
To exercise my divine right
A lump begins to swell my throat
You cannot see this tear stained face
You cannot hear these tormented cries
If you don't understand my actions
Then you must read between the lines
And now I throw back in your face
The only gift for which you didn't pay
The gift of breath, of life, of being
Something I no longer see a purpose in

As I embrace eternal sleep
I pray the Lord my soul to keep

entry.title: Acid Reign - Joke Chain - 가사
entry.content:
Hidden below, a shudder of curiosity
Testing a toy of power unequalled
An exercise of megalomania
Feel the glory, technology in motion

A simple can, pricks our ozone protection
An explosion invites infection
Out of sight, out of our minds
Won't you wonder when the sun doesn't shine

We already know the potential shown
Why do you enleash this toy
Hide your fun beneath the sand
Effects sweep, suffocate land

A simple can, pricks our ozone protection
An explosion invites infection
Out of sight, out of our minds
Won't you wonder when the sun doesn't shine

Responsibility is not the word
That comes to my conscience
Negligible is what I'd call
Your so called testing experiments

Lack of respect is what I understand
The least about you
For this earth
Which was not given to us
For misuse of any kind

All of that green, evaporated waste
My mind conjures a better case
Morbid fascination of a boy
The ultimate joke, to test a toy

A simple can, pricks our ozone protection
An explosion invites infection
Out of sight, out of our minds
Won't you wonder

entry.title: Acid Reign - Creative Restraint - 가사
entry.content:
Close your mind to controversy
Don't express opinion just agreement
Good healthy views and morals
Join the system patronise don't antagonise
To place truth on the page
Is the food I chose the digest
To share my thoughts and cares
And inquire into what's best

Blinded by your cause
And numb to the effect
Your true destiny is beckoning
Beckoning all of you

The basis of human nature
To protect what is close precious
Intentions to defend and purify
Achieve and preserve innocence
To enforce your standards and beliefs
Onto an entire generation
Surely this makes you no better
Than Aryan dictators past

Blinded by your cause
And numb to the effect
Your true destiny is beckoning
Beckoning all of you

Individuals must choose their own
Controlled recreation holds no appeal
Preached regulations breed negativity
Abundant negativity produces animosity
Dare to manipulate the constitution
In my mind it sets a dangerous presidence
Restrain the pen, freedom pollution
In a hope to quell natural rebellion

Your aim is to culture future generations
Perfection without any race exception
Antiseptic for the mind and soul
Consists of tampering human ethics
To be able to collect all the opinions
The weapon of reason, learn to be friend
To blinker en masse a dangerous notion
For he who is blind cannot defend

Blinded by your cause
And numb to the effect
Your true destiny is beckoning
Beckoning all of you

entry.title: Acid Reign - The Fear (Demo) - 가사
entry.content:
You sit and wait for the last straw
Never knowing when crime will strike you down
Society has sentenced you to be a prisoner
A prisoner of your body and your home

Imagine what it's like
To be imprisoned
In your own home
Not knowing which
Day could be your last
Hide those savings

Now withering away, just like a flower
You curl up and you lie in foetal position
Your life has been reversed, you end it as a child
No longer can you define wring or right

Can you trust
Justice to deal
All fair cards
Or once again
Will the culprit remain free
And the victims of honesty
Left to shiver in solitude
Nothing to comfort, not even truth

Euthanasia isn't your answer
You have your right to live
But the pressure you are under
Means you take more than you give

You're afraid of living
You're afraid of dying
More of you drop each day
Trying to protect your life's work
But we all grow old
And become more vulnerable
Easy prey for the thief
And thus
A PEER OF THE FEAR
